segments.text: You look fresh recently . And .. what's your weight now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? Congratulations ! That's really something beyond my imagination . How did you make it ? Did you keep on a diet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , you know I can't bear eating less .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then do the slim pills take effect on you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've quit it already . I go to aerobics class everyday instead .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You see . I've lost my weight in spite of my good appetite .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd better exercise my body too . My limbs are rusty now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think so . You look full of energy every day . Time has stood still with you .
segments.speaker: S2
